item.title: T.O.S To every page help?
item.dc:creator: @RsGhd RsGhd
item.description:
@RsGhd wrote:

OK in other guides it told me to put this
if (!isset ($_COOKIE[‘cookiename’]))
header (“Location: nocookie.php”);
else
header (“Location: foundcookie.php”);
in my index for smf.
But that only redirects the index page, i want it to redirect to the agreement on all pages. So where would I put it?

Read full topic
